name: get_site_from_building_component_library
display_name: Get Site From Building Component Library

arguments.name: site
arguments.display_name: Pick Colorado Site Component from the BCL

modeler_description: To start with measure will hard code a string to narrow the search. Then a shorter list than all weather files on BCL will be shown. In the future woudl be nice to select region based on climate zone set in building object.
description: Populate choice list from BCL, then selected site will be brought into model. This will include the weather file, design days, and water main temperatures.
